page.title: 13 Occupation Con't
page.content:
Wheat and barley were quite frequently seen as were crops such potatoes and turnips. Acreage ranged from three-quarters up to two hundred and fifty acres. Most of the farms were quite highly machanised, point 3-4 using the given scale.There was only one small farm using only the minimum source of mechanisation. We also found a farm breeding race horses which was the only one of its kind within the area. Occupations were as so :
Houswives = 10 Doctors = 2 Nurse = 1 Wordproccessor = 1 Factory foreman = 1 Retired = 9
